Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 79th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Risaburou Eichi (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/2015, off Dennis Moore (MON)...
8/9/2016: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $11,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Injured on 9/15/2016 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 6/2/2017 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/6/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $2,700,000 per year...
